function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased vector densities and geographical spread due to climate change","Impact":"Higher risk of vector-borne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing vector surveillance and risk mapping, modifying natural environments","Technologies":"Climate modeling, GIS mapping, environmental modification techniques","People":"Populations living in areas affected by climate change","Owner":"Public health authorities, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of understanding the impacts of global change on vector-borne diseases","Impact":"Ineffective policy and practice for disease prevention and control","Mitigation":"Improving knowledge through interdisciplinary research, adopting a biosocial perspective","Technologies":"Interdisciplinary research methods, biosocial modeling","People":"Public health researchers, policy makers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate community-based approaches for vector-borne disease strategies","Impact":"Ineffective community resilience and adaptation to VBDs","Mitigation":"Implementing best practices for community-based approaches, improving community participation","Technologies":"Community engagement tools, participatory action research","People":"Local communities, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Community organizations, public health agencies"}]}
